item.title: Beta now live
item.description:
The site is now live! Note, however, that the software is still being heavily developed and many more features are still in the pipeline. There will be things that misbehave and there will probably be crashes.

We do need users, though. To test and, most importantly, to add content because teoremer.com is nothing without content. And many users are needed to collectively create quality content.

item.title: Math item markup
item.description: The markup to use when editing math items is based on Markdown. All the markup of Markdown is supported, except for inline HTML, links and images.

item.title: On categories
item.description: A category, as used on teoremer, can be seen as a tag with another category as parent. A special root tag is used to represent top-level categories and no cycles are allowed. This way all categories represent a rooted tree, or heirarchy, of tags.

item.title: Introducing teoremer
item.description:
If you distill any book or article on some mathematical subject, then what you are left with is usually a lot of notation, definitions, algorithms, theorems, lemmas, corollaries, and proofs.

teoremer is a collection of such mathematical items.
